mapper.insert: insert into `exam` (id, examName, createTime, createPeople, startTime, endTime, duration, grade, elective , department, major, subject, className) values (#{id}, #{examName}, #{createTime}, #{createPeople}, #{startTime}, #{endTime}, #{duration}, #{grade}, #{elective}, #{department}, #{major}, #{subject}, #{className})

insert into `examStu` (userId, examId, examName, createTime, createPeople, startTime, endTime, grade, department, major, subject, className, electiv) values
(#{item.userId}, #{item.examId}, #{item.examName}, #{item.createTime}, #{item.createPeople}, #{item.startTime}, #{item.endTime}, #{item.grade}, #{item.department}, #{item.major}, #{item.subject}, #{item.className}, #{item.electiv})
insert into `examMsg` (examId, selectMsg, blankMsg, judgeMsg, essayMsg) values (#{examId}, #{selectMsg}, #{blankMsg}, #{judgeMsg}, #{essayMsg})
mapper.select: select id, examName, startTime, endTime, grade, department, major, subject, className, elective from `exam` where createPeople = #{userId} order by startTime
